abstract: Lr opposing U S supplies for war victims
snippet: That our merchandise export trade in June should have increased 48 per cent over June, 1939, and should, in fact, have been the largest in value since 1929, caused some surprise, in view of the European markets which had been cut off from us by Ge...
lead_paragraph: That our merchandise export trade in June should have increased 48 per cent over June, 1939, and should, in fact, have been the largest in value since 1929, caused some surprise, in view of the European markets which had been cut off from us by German conquest.
